word: H2498 - חָלַף - châlaph - khaw-laf' - Abolish - ஒழித்துவிடு

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - உருவக்கடாவு. கடந்துபோ, முளை, ஒழி, மாறு, விடி, மாற்று, புதிதாக்கு, செலுத்து, தழை, மாறுபாடாக்கு
to pass on or away, to pass through, to pass by, to go through, to grow up, to change, to go on from
3) to come on anew, to sprout again (of grass)
b) (Piel) to cause to pass, to change
1) to change, to substitute, to alter, to change for better, to renew
2) to show newness (used of a tree)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; properly to slide by, that is, (by implication) to hasten away, pass on, spring up, pierce or change: - abolish, alter change, cut off, go on forward, grow up, be over, pass (away, on, through), renew, sprout, strike through.
Cognate: H2475, H2487, H2498, H2500, H2501, H4252, H4253
